title: Le Mirador Senior Apartments -Accepting Applications Now!!!
map_address: 1191 Coleman Road near Almaden EXPY/Coleman Road
posting_body: ['1 Bedroom/1 Bath *Current Rental Rate on select units ranging from $1642 to $2360 - * Contact the Leasing Office Today 4O8-268-931O for Current Move-in Specials!', 'Le Mirador Senior is an affordable apartment community for age 55 and older, offering 1 bedroom apartments.', 'Located on Coleman Road, We are located directly across from Almaden Lake Park and less than 4.2 miles from Oakridge Westfield Shopping Center.', '*Maximum Combined Annual Household Income Levels:', '1 persons: $70,740', '2 person: $80,880', '*Minimum Income: 1.5 x current monthly rent', '*Income limits and rent is subject to change at any time.', '**Section 8 Housing Vouchers Accepted**', '**NO ASSIGNED PARKING AVAILABLE*', '• Apartment Amenities: On-site laundry rooms, Private Patios or Balconies, Ceiling Fan, Cable Ready, AC/Heater wall unit', '• Property Amenities: Resident Lounge- Community room, outdoor patio, open sun deck, Tech Center with Wi-Fi, Fitness Center, Elevator Access,', '• Online Rent Payments, Online Resident Portal, Online Maintenance Service Requests', '<URL>', 'Floor plan specifications and prices are subject to change without notice.', 'CARE strictly prohibits subletting of all apartment homes we manage.', 'Please contact the onsite community staff should you come across a sublet or short term stay at this location through other online sources.', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
